fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We incorrectly referred to the Labour MP Owen Smith as the “ex-Northern Ireland secretary”; Smith was the shadow Northern Ireland secretary from June 2017 to March 2018 (Labour activists press Corbyn not to back Brexit in snap election, 10 December, page 9). Other recently corrected articles include: Our plan to revive Europe can succeed where Macron and Piketty failed | Yanis Varoufakis Landlord fined £25,000 over lack of hot water for disabled tenant
